title: END UNIT, YARD, PRIVATE BASEMENT, CENTRAL AIR, FLORIDA ROOM
posting_body: ['END UNIT, YARD, PRIVATE BASEMENT, CENTRAL AIR CONDITIONING, FLORIDA ROOM', 'This condo is located west of Groesbeck, north of Cass, and south of Hall road.', 'The rent is $975.00', 'The security deposit is $1,462.50', 'Total move in costs are $2,437.50 (This amount includes the first months rent)', 'Different lease options are negotiable.', 'There is a newer stove & refrigerator in the kitchen.', 'Interior has recently been redecorated, etc.', 'This beautiful redecorated 1 bedroom brick condo has a 9 x 12 Florida room.', 'This condo is an end unit and surrounded on 3 sides by a nice maintenance free yard.', 'This truly is the best of both worlds with the yard, private basement, end unit & a Florida room.', 'It has ceramic tile flooring in the entryway, the bathroom, and the kitchen.', 'It also has window treatments and ceiling fans throughout.', 'The large 17 x 11 living room and the 13 x 11 master bedroom and the bathroom are all located on the first floor.', 'It has a private and partitioned basement, with central air conditioning and gas forced air heat.', 'There is both a gas and 220 Volt hook up for the dryer.', 'Don’t hesitate on this one, it won’t last long!!!!!', 'BE SURE TO LEAVE YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS & PHONE NUMBER', 'Contact us regarding this home and to be able to apply for this home and other properties with us for free online.', 'YOU CAN FILL OUT AN APPLICATION ONLINE, AT NO CHARGE.', "If you're interested in this or any other property we suggest you fill out an application at this time as it will become necessary to move forward with us.", "Naturally we do not want to waste each other's time.", 'Copy and paste the following link into your browser to apply online for free', '<URL>']
